channel.title: Npc drops
channel.description:
[code]#Desert strykewyrm 9465:30 15486:1 995:500000 200:2 202:2 204:2 206:2 208:2 210:2 212:2 214:2 216:2 218:2 220:2[/code]
added in NPCDrops.TSM but its not dropping anything

item.title: Npc drops
item.dc:creator: @nathanrr44 nathanrr44
item.description:
@nathanrr44 wrote:

there are 2 files with npc drops your correct however one of this has loads of random shit in it like
995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995
on a single line. and when searching a npc id that allready contains drops it doesnt exist.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc drops
item.dc:creator: @Fluffys Fluffys
item.description:
@Fluffys wrote:

there should be 2 txt documnets named NPCdrops. if one of the docs says NPCdrops and is not a txt drop, then open it in notepad. then search for the id of the monster and add the drop there. get teamviewer i might be able to help

Read full topic
